Godfreys Bundall is a Franchise store - The person who runs the store owns the store and is dedicated to give you the best service possible. The staff in the Bundall store have up to 12 years of work experience within the vacuum and cleaning supplies industry.  We have the knowledge to advise you on the purchase that best suits your cleaning needs. Bundall was the Godfreys Queensland  Franchise of the Year for 2011 due to our outstanding customer service. We have qualified full time staff members who ensure you are served as quickly and as efficiently as possible so you can get on with your day

 

We stock one of the largest range of cleaning supplies on the Gold Coast, so if you need help with anything cleaning come on in and we'll help you out. Here at Bundall we also offer free instore product demonstrations by our experienced sales staff so you can try before you buy. Our motto is “If you need it to clean it we have it”! Pop in or call us today so you get the best possible prices available on all your vacuum and cleaning needs!
